reviewText: I've watch Sling blade a long time ago and really loved it and notice they don't play it on TV so I ordered it for my collection.
All was as expected. Received prior to the estimated date. Quality was good and the color was just as described.
I LOVE THE MOVIES THAT BILLIE BOB THORTON IS VERY GOOD  ACTOR---I LOVE ALL HIS MOVIES---HE IS A VERY ACTOR
The case was broken and the inside had broke a piece off !! I kept it instead of giving it to my friend as his gift! Shamed to give it them, but too lazy to fool with returning it!
love this movie Billy Bob Thorton is awesome. This movie had you guessing what will happen next. This is a must see
Billy Bob is the best actor ever. You can see the skill he has performing very different roles in these two movies. If you are not a fan, you will be.
I purchased this DVD blue ray because these are two of my favorite movies and to be able to get both of these movies on one DVD was what I thought a great bargain. The price was very affordable also!
Both amazing movies and at a great price.
Two great movies for the price of one!
was great

I liked, no, sorry, I enjoyed both of these movies. I really liked SLING BLADE, but I loved MONSTER'S BALL.  Monster's Ball had me on the edge of the seat, all the way through. Halle Berry's performance was great and so was the story. If you want an evenings great entertainment, then get this 2 cd set. It will have you wondering why they put two good movies together for one low price.
I love this movie
2 great movies. Had to add to my collection.
Two phenomenal movies. I've owned them for years but it's great to have them together on Blu-ray
good movie

Sling Blad gets the 5 stars Monsters ball would get 2 maybe 3 stars
Sling Blade is a one of a kind unique story. The main charater "Carl" is played by Billy Bob Thorton.
Billy Bob Thorton wrote the script.  Between his acting and writing this to me is the best movie to date
that Billy Bob has made.

Great double feature, enjoyed the Monster's Ball, but will need to reorder in order to watch Sling Blade, the dog found the DVD to be delicious.

Sling Blade: This is a great film. The story is compelling. If you haven't seen it, change that! I'm not going to spoil it for you here. The cinematography is perfect. You can see that attention was paid to every detail.
This is my favorite modern classic, mostly because of Billy Bob Thornton's performance. I personally saw this film several times, and didn't even know he was in it. (Guess I should have read the cover sooner!)
Anyways, it's a great film, and by itself, was more than 5 stars
Monster's Ball: I tried to get into this film, but I couldn't. There's not one character I could root for, and honestly, I gave up when Halle Berry went from showing Billy Bob Thornton things of her dead husband and son's to throwing herself at BBT. I couldn't take it anymore, and shut it off.
Fast Shipping and great movies.
2 Awesome movies, you can't go wrong on this purchase!
Billy Bob Thorton is the man, what can I say?!

Love, love, love both of these movies. Berween them, they engulf your full range of emotions. These are some of Billy Bob's best work, especially Sling Blade. They are a bit deep, even dark, but you can appreciate them and how real they could be.

The product arrived just as I'd hoped. As for the movies, Sling Blade is awesome; Monsters Ball was a horrible movie and I couldn't see how it could win awards. Garbage! Halle Berry's performance was just... sad and I couldn't see her ever falling for Billy Bob Thorton. Not believable in the slightest.

Excellent double feature of 2 Oscar winning films. Only drawback was some supplements only available on DVD of Sling Blade.
Otherwise, excellent value for 2 wonderful performances by Halle Berry and Billy Bob Thornton.

Both Sling Blade and Monsters Ball are on separate disks and both are Anamorphic Widescreen. Quite an excellent deal if I say so myself and two great Movies.
Sling Blade is definitely not a kid movie but still a good view for the adult.

I enjoyed both of these movies.  I hadn't seen Sling Blade in many years, but watched it with my son and enjoyed it again.  Definitely a different kind of movie.  Monsters Ball has good actors and an interesting story.  Highly recommend both.
Great movies. Loved them both. Very intense movies. I would recommend seeing them to anyone who likes Billy Bob Thornton. Halle Berry is a great actress.
They were both OK movies not what I expected thought they both be better because of the actors in them
I bought it for my friend. I had never seen the movie before and someone had borrowed hers and never returned. The movie was very good and different.
Billy Bob Thornton is believable and creative in both movies. Sling Blade is a must see for any fan. It will keep you awake at night.
Only four stars because movie froze up one time ! Other than that no issues and I have always loved this movie.

I ordered this for someone else that wanted me to order it for them.  The second movie disk (Monster's Ball) doesn't even work and it was tried in different players and wouldn't work in any of them!  The first disk (Sling Blade) did work.

Love Sling Blade however the additional movie Monster's Ball I could not watch, it was so glitchy and froze so much it was unwatchable. Sadly for $5.00 it is not worth shipping back for a replacement. Would love if they would just replace it without having to ship them both back.
